english.segment1: I carved a picture, into my skin. I showed everyone, I'll never sin. Just cause I bleed like you, I'm not a man. Not of this world, and you must understand that.
english.segment2: I've got a predestined plan. I walk better than you. I'll preach what I practice, and I will practice on you.
english.segment3: I carved your holy name, inside my skin. I showed everyone, I'm not a trend. I am a zombie, I'd be better off dead. I speak of angels, but host demons instead.
english.segment4: I pray for a prayer that's you. I am praying on you. And I talk about walking, and I try to walk upon you.
english.segment5: When I look at all of you I see, I see the weak, I'm a wolf among the lost sheep. When I look at all of you I see, I see the weak, I'm a wolf among the lost sheep.
english.segment6: I will tell them the scriptures. I will profit your name. I will sell them the scriptures, and I will pocket your fame.
english.segment7: I magnify splinters. The world is carved from my eyes. I am posing for pictures. I am feasting on bread and your wine
